DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine the effects of pregabalin on sleep problems in patients with seizures.
DOC.brief_title: A Study of Lyrica as Treatment for Sleep Problems in Patients With Sleep Problems and Seizures
DOC.criteria: Partial epileptic seizures Not taking more than 1 background antiepileptic drug at study entry Disturbed sleep More than 1 secondarily generalized tonic/clonic seizure per week on average over the previous 3 months Medical, psychological, or social conditions that could interfere with normal sleep
